testproblem.name: spherical patchTests gmsh reading and writing on the sphere with 2d horizontal spherical input mesh, checkpointing and flredecomp.

problem_definition.command_line: mpiexec fluidity -v2 -l spherical_segment.flml && mpiexec ../../bin/flredecomp -v -l -i 3 -o 1 spherical_segment_2_checkpoint serial && fluidity -v2 -l serial.flml

variables.variable: import os files = os.listdir("./") solvers_converged = not "matrixdump" in files and not "matrixdump.info" in files
